message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. While $15,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this is a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I am still unable to meet your price. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,000. This is my final offer.
